net.derquinse.common.metrics.cache
Class CacheMetrics

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.common.metrics.cache.CacheMetrics

public final class CacheMetrics
extends Object

Metrics for a Guava Cache. The cache must record stats for the metrics to be useful.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez
